price: “Shariikota keessan waammadhaa” jedhameeni, Isaan ni waammatu; jarris isaaniif hin owwaatanu, adabbii [ibiddaas] ni argan. Odoo qajeeluun isaanii argameera ta’ee [adabbii hin argan turan].
arabic: وَقِيلَ ٱدۡعُواْ شُرَكَآءَكُمۡ فَدَعَوۡهُمۡ فَلَمۡ يَسۡتَجِيبُواْ لَهُمۡ وَرَأَوُاْ ٱلۡعَذَابَۚ لَوۡ أَنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ يَهۡتَدُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: waqīla id'ʿū shurakāakum fadaʿawhum falam yastajībū lahum wara-awū al-ʿadhāba law annahum kānū yahtadūna
